Description: This control checks whether AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) inline policies do not include "Effect": "Allow" with "Action": "Service:*" (e.g. s3:*) for individual AWS services or use the combination of "NotAction" with an "Effect" of "Allow".
DisplayName: Require that AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) inline policies do not have wildcard service actions
RemediationMessage: Remove statements from AWS IAM inline policies with "Effect": "Allow" and "Action": "service:*" or "Effect": "Allow" and "NotAction".
